# [[gymnasium]]; [[gym]] {{gloss|place providing facilities for physical exercise}} {{zh-mw|間}}

====Usage notes====
Although {{zh-l|體育館}} and {{zh-l|健身房}} both translate into ''gymnasium'' or ''gym'' in English, the former refers to a venue used for sports and competitions, while the latter refers to a gym which provides facilities for physical exercise.
